title: Mardi Gras Celebration | Key West Events at The Gates Hotel
seo_description:
Join us for a Mardi Gras Celebration at the gates hotel //24 North Hotel. We’ll have great New Orleans inspired drink specials, food specials, beads and masks! Buy a drink and get a free mask! 
Join us at the bar for a fun celebration and some great music! Music from 4-7pm
short_description: Join us for a Mardi Gras Celebration at the gates hotel //24 North Hotel. We’ll have great New Orleans inspired drink specials, food specials, beads and masks! Buy a drink and get a free mask!  Join us at the bar for a fun celebration and some great music! Music from 4-7pm
